content: adorable bunny and bear sweaters to fit chest measurement 6 mos 17 43 cm 12 mos 18 45 5 cm 18 mos 19 48 cm 24 mos 20 51 cm finished chest measurement 6 mos 19½ 49 5 cm 12 mos 21½ 54 5 cm 18 mos 23½ 59 5 cm 24 mos 25½ 65 cm this pattern features in issue 37 of crochet now which is on sale from 17th january 2019 in supermarkets newsagents and craft stores across the uk copies can also be ordered from www moremags com or if you prefer digital editions are available via www pocketmags com
